Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: Mist swirls gently around you and rises up from the river to the south in thick trendils. The sounds of frogs and river birds echo faintly all around you, and greyed light filters down through the overhead tree canopy. The river bank heads east and the actual river flows south of here.

Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: Mist swirls gently around you and rises up from the river to the south in thick trendils. The sounds of frogs and river birds echo faintly all around you, and greyed light filters down through the overhead tree canopy. The river bank heads east and west.

Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: Mist swirls gently around you and rises up from the river to the south in thick trendils. The sounds of frogs and river birds echo faintly all around you, and greyed light filters down through the overhead tree canopy. The river bank heads west, while the actual river lies to the south. North of here you can hear the sounds of bells and mutted voices.

Room.Name: On a muddy path
Room.Description: Thick mist covers the muddy pathway here. The path seems clear and there is little vegetation growing on or around it, yet there are also no signs of recent passage by other people. To the south the sounds of a river can be heard, while north of here there seems to be a large clearing with tents and stalls.

Room.Name: SW corner of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Southern clearing of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: SE corner of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Western side of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Central main Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Western side of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Beneath a Billowing Calliope
Room.Description: You stand beneath a huge canopy housing a strange contraption of metal and wood. It looks like some kind of merry-go-round, but instead of wooden horses to ride it has torn and desicated bodies piled up on poles, with bone carved seats set on their backs.

Room.Name: Eastern Side of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: NW corner of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Northern clearing of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: NE corner of the Carnival
Room.Description: Mist hangs low over the ground and wet dew soaks your clothes and clings to your hair. Decayed old bits of festive decoration and food lie scattered around, but there is little else to indicate any real life in this carnival.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: Amidst the Stalls
Room.Description: The mist in this place sends cold chills through you as it slowly rises around you. There is almost no noise to be heard, certainly not what you would expect from a normal carnival. Yet strangely enough there are stalls and tents erected, and motion can be seen within them.

Room.Name: The Swordmaster's Tent
Room.Description: Old posters proclaiming 'The Greatest Swordsman in the World' and other such things line the walls of this tent. On the ground several hacked off body parts have been left to rot, and a number of rusted swords are still embedded in some of them.

Room.Name: In a Clearing of Nails
Room.Description: This entire clearing has been embedded with nails. From tiny pin-like nails to huge dagger sized ones, they protrude sickeningly from the ground. The impaled and torn remains of some unfortunate soul still hangs loosely upon some of these, but the rest seem rusty and out of use.

Room.Name: The Gypsy's Stall
Room.Description: A single rotted table is all that seems to be in this room. Mist seeps in from the side of the stall, and a strange stench fills the air.

Room.Name: Inside the Cage of Freaks
Room.Description: Excrement and disgusting food stuffs litter the cage. All around you the signs of degredation and death can be smelled and felt.

Room.Name: The Freak House
Room.Description: Signs on the walls show rough drawings of horrible creatures and advertise them with lines like, 'See the Terrible Three headed Tiger!". There is a disgusting smell coming from the cage west.

Room.Name: In a Star covered Tent
Room.Description: A single decayed table sits in this room, with pieces of shattered glass upon it. The glass appears to be the fragmentary remains of a crystal ball, and thick green mist seems to be seeping out of it. Nothing else but the exit west is of much interest in here.

Room.Name: In a Blood-stained Stall
Room.Description: Blood and guts are spattered all over the stall walls, and drenched into the ground. A sign reads: 'Amazing Blood Brothers! See them drink the blood from an entire human being in one minute!'.

Room.Name: The Tent of Ill-fortune
Room.Description: This tent has holes and rips all through it. Mist seeps into it from outside, and the floor is barely visible through it all. A small table with some burnt cards and dried tea leaves is in the middle of the room.

Room.Name: A Gold-lined Tent
Room.Description: This tent is covered in what appears to be gold dust, and the floor iteself looks as if made of gold. Yet there is something strangely wrong about it all..almost as if it is some kind of trick.

Room.Name: A cleared pathway
Room.Description: You stand on a pathway that has been cleared though the woods north of the carnival area. North of here you can see a huge tent of some kind nestled within the woodlands.

Room.Name: Before the Grand Tent
Room.Description: In front of you a huge grey tent has been erected. Mist wraps around it almost like a second skin, and from within you can hear strange sounds of pain and anguish. A pathway has been cleared around the tent, and another path leads south away from here.

Room.Name: Southern end of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path heads east and west.

Room.Name: A corner of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path contines north and west.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Grand Tend
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: A Corner of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues south and west.

Room.Name: Northern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: Northern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues east and west, while to the north a patch of burnt woodland can be seen.

Room.Name: Northern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: A Corner of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues east and south.

Room.Name: Western side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: Western side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. To the west a path through the woods has been cleared.

Room.Name: Western side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: Western side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: A Corner of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues north and east.

Room.Name: Southern side of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: A path through the mist
Room.Description: You stand outside a huge, mist enshrouded tent. Strange sounds of pain and anguish can be heard from within, but nothing seems to be stirring.

Room.Name: A path through the mist
Room.Description: The path through the woods is cold and unnerving. There are no normal wildlife sounds, and the surrounding foliage looks almost evil. To the east the path heads towards a huge tent, while west it gets darker.

Room.Name: A path through the mist
Room.Description: The path here is very cold and mist rises up past your legs. A soft rasping sound echoes faintly around you, but it seems to come and go without any purpose or direction.

Room.Name: A path through the mist
Room.Description: The path is enshrouded in mist and only a faint cold light filters in from the thick tree canopy overhead. A feeling of dread evil is being exuded by the very trees themselves.

Room.Name: Beneath a Strange Hut
Room.Description: Here within the darkened woods you have come upon a strange hut on chicken legs. The hut itself looks normal, but rests upon a pair of huge legs. From above you the sounds of hissing and bubbling can be heard within the hut.

Room.Name: Inside Baba-Yaga's Hut
Room.Description: The inside of this hut is enormous. Far larger than it could possibly be from it's outside dimensions. Powerful magic fills the room, and you see boiling, bubbling potions scattered around the room.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You stand at the entrance to a massive tent. It looks like a normal circus tent, but there is something sinster about it all. Mist seeps through the bottom of it and covers the ground, making it hard to see what you are walking into. To the east and west are spectator stands

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: Above the Main Ring
Room.Description: At the end of the main spectator stands there is a ladder leading down into the main circus ring. The mist within is so thick and high that nothing can be seen, but vague figures can be seen moving around. A sense of something evil comes from below...

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: In the Stands of the Grand Tent
Room.Description: You are amongst some spectator stands in a huge circus tent. Some old bones rest upon the seats, but nobody else is here. Through the mist filling the region you can make out vague figures moving in the centre ring of the tent. Sounds of pain and anguish can be heard faintly echoing through the air.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing. A ladder ascends out of the mist from here.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Lost in the Misty Ring
Room.Description: The mist within the main circus ring is head high and so thick it could almost be a forest fire's smoke. Except that it is chillingly cold and soaking into your body with a strange deathly touch. Around you shapes can be seen moving, but it is hard to see exactly what they are, or what they are doing.

Room.Name: Before the Turning Wheel
Room.Description: You have come across a huge wheel that is slowly rotating in the mists. Strapped to the wooden devices are the bodies of several young women, all in various stages of decomposition. Deep cuts linger on all of their bodies, and several small knives still protrude from a couple. All around you the mist swirls and hides other such horrors.

Room.Name: In the Clown Corner
Room.Description: The mist here receedes a little to show a clear floor space with a lot of rubbish lying around. Very little else is here though, and it doesn't appear to be of any real interest.

Room.Name: In the Burning Pentegram
Room.Description: The mists here seems to swirl around the centre of the room where a large pentegram has been drawn out in dried, congealed blood. Candles line the unholy shape and give it a strange hazy look amidst the chill mist.

Room.Name: A Blackened path
Room.Description: There seems little of interest here but blackened and burnt trees. For some reason this part of the area seems even darker than the rest. To the south you can make out a huge carnival tent.

Room.Name: On a burnt path
Room.Description: The path here is burned badly and bits of cooked flesh have been left hanging from bushes. The smell of death and decay hangs heavily in the air. Something truly dark has been using this passage for something. To the east you can make out smoke rising from what appears to be the very ground itself.

Room.Name: On a burnt path
Room.Description: The path here becomes even more badly scorched, and the few trees that stand here have been reduced to blackened piles of charcoal. To the east you can make out a huge pit from which thick roiling smoke pours forth.

Room.Name: Above a Black Pit
Room.Description: You stand above a huge gaping pit in the woodlands. All around it the forest is burnt and dead, suffocated by the thick choking smoke that is spewing forth. The smoke is so thick you can only make out faint orange flames within the pit, and right now it appears impossible to enter.

Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: The mist dances around you in a gentle embrace, rising from the river to the south in thick tendrils. It envelops you like a veil, its cool dampness brushing against your skin as it winds its way through the trees. The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: The mist dances around you in a gentle embrace, rising from the river to the south in thick tendrils. It envelops you like a veil, its cool dampness brushing against your skin as it winds its way through the trees. The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

It envelops you like a veil, its cool dampness brushing against your skin as it winds its way through the trees. The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

Room.Name: On the Banks of a Misty River
Room.Description: The mist dances around you in a gentle embrace, rising from the river to the south in thick tendrils. It envelops you like a veil, its cool dampness brushing against your skin as it winds its way through the trees. The sound of water lapping against the shore and the rustling of leaves create a soothing background melody, while the thick fog creates a dream-like atmosphere. The river's gentle flow is reflected in the calm waters, creating a peaceful and serene landscape that beckons you to explore further.

NPC.name: baba-yaga baba yaga witch woman
NPC.description: This old woman embodies all that is demonic. Her small, hunched stature does nothing to hide her menacing aura and her eyes hold a glint of something truly wicked.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting old lady beckons you with a withered finger.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: burning clown
NPC.description: This clown has a look of extreme pain on his face as he rushes about with fire burning his body. It seems that someone's idea of a good clown act is to set them on fire and watch them burn to death.
NPC.longDescription: A white faced clown screams in agony as his fire bubbles his skin.

NPC.name: frozen ice clown
NPC.description: This clown is encrusted in freezing ice. The look of terror and pain on his face shows that this is something unexpected and horrific to him. Something truly strange and evil has changed this carnival very recently...
NPC.longDescription: A blue faced clown stares in horror at the ice encasing him.

NPC.name: vampire knifer thrower
NPC.description: The eyes of this undead knife thrower are filled with immmense hate and resolve. He seems quite determined to land every knife he throws on his unfortunate target.
NPC.longDescription: A dark man with piercing red eyes is here playing with a knife.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: girl victim
NPC.description: Unlike conventional circus acts involving knife throwing, this one seems to require that the knives actually hit the victim, rather than miss. The girl is in obvious pain as her body rotates slowly on the target wheel, blood splashing in large rivlets down her body and onto the floor.
NPC.longDescription: A young girl on a rotating target moans in pain as knives cut her body.

NPC.name: ringmaster master
NPC.description: The Ringmaster of the carnival is a wicked and demonic man who's eyes light up at the sound of pain. He hisses with a forked tongue as he slowly recites a rite of dark invocation.
NPC.longDescription: A stunted little man stands amidst a circle of burning candles.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Fade

NPC.name: man victim
NPC.description: This man has a glazed look in his eyes. There is no pain in his eyes, just a strangely uncaring gaze as if he was under the influence of some spell. It appears that whatever ritual he is to be sacrificed in does not require much response from the sacrifice itself..
NPC.longDescription: A man with wooden stakes through his hands and feet lies on the floor.

NPC.name: wolfspider spider
NPC.description: It's as big as a dog, with spinldy hairy legs. And pincers as the size of your hands.
NPC.longDescription: A massive hairy spider scuttles beneath the mist.

NPC.name: chimera
NPC.description: A legendary chimera, composed of lion, dragon and goat. Smoke and flames erupt from the draconian part of it, while the lion and goat heads snap and thrash in an attempt to break and devour.
NPC.longDescription: A goat, dragon and lion headed beast stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lich gypsy
NPC.description: Not a very nice person in real life, and now even nastier in the undead life.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting gypsy man with a shrunken head spits at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: woman gullveig witch
NPC.description: Gullveig the Witch, maker of gold and bringer of misfortune. Her magic has brought down many as they seek to own the wealth that she alone can make from nothing.
NPC.longDescription: A hideously deformed old woman is here stroking her golden robes.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lady teller fortuneteller woman
NPC.description: This fortune teller seems more interested in destroying your future than fortelling it...
NPC.longDescription: A large fat lady extends her hands as if seeking something.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lich monk blood brother
NPC.description: One of the Blood Brothers who's act is to bring more blood into the world. He is a travesty of a true monk, seeking death and chaos rather than enlightenment and understanding.
NPC.longDescription: A strange figure in brown robes stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lich samurai
NPC.description: One of the more exotic acts in the carnival of death. This man uses his skills in weaponry to slice and dice anyone who cares to visit him.
NPC.longDescription: A man in ceremonial armor makes complex motions with it's swords.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lich soothsayer
NPC.description: Very dead, very evil. This lich seems to be stuck in the position it had when living. Only now it sooths a person's problems forever.
NPC.longDescription: The lich soothsayer raises it's burning eyes to regard you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: man nailed
NPC.description: A dark twist to a normal act. This man seems to actual being trying to see how many nails he can get piercing his body, rather than showing how he can lie unharmed upon them.
NPC.longDescription: A man impaled with dozens of nails looks up in pain and sneers.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack Fade

NPC.name: lich monk blood brother
NPC.description: One of the Blood Brothers who's act is to bring more blood into the world. He is a travesty of a true monk, seeking death and chaos rather than enlightenment and understanding.
NPC.longDescription: A man wearing sharp spikes is here making violent motions.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision
